about_the_game:
Cut out your webcam background without a greenscreen. Build your own avatar or choose from our diverse set of avatars and place it in any virtual environment for your video meetings or streaming events. Your Avatar tracks your movement and speech as an animated virtual you.

Customize your background in real time. Ad video or animated backgrounds. Always be ready to impress. Use special effects animations over streaming and recorded videos to enhance your webcam video. Start with ChromaCam's premade effects, or build your own using the versatile effects creation tool. Your audience can use Twitch bot chat to control your custom streamer effects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel 6th generation or the AMD equivalent (We recommend quad core CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: iGPU Intel UHD 630 minimum
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel 8th generation or the AMD equivalent (We recommend quad core or above)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU (GTX, RTX or AMD) with higher 4 GiB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
